EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Live Stream Confirmation - Day of
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: A New Approach to Big Data - Live Stream Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thanks for registering for A New Approach to Big Data <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data> via live stream.
The event is today, 2/17 from 11:00AM to 12:30PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>.
Join the live stream now >> <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data>
{{my.Save The Date - Live Stream:default=edit me}}
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
